thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I have ordered several White Mountain puzzles over the years; some purchased from website, some in gift shops, etc. Each and everyone has been of wonderful quality and true to the picture displayed. I gain a great deal of enjoyment working them and dealing with such a good company. White Mountain delivers a truly superb "customer experience". Thank you!!
